TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EventLogWebEventProvider extends System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider
Public NotInheritable Class EventLogWebEventProvider Inherits WebEventProvider
public ref class EventLogWebEventProvider sealed : System::Web::Management::WebEventProvider

summary.span: 实现事件提供程序，该程序将 ASP.NET 状况监视事件记录到 Windows 应用程序事件日志中。

span.span: Implements an event provider that logs ASP.NET health-monitoring events into the Windows Application Event Log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，用于管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在管理运行状况事件期间帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. ，失败审核和 （启用） 默认情况下配置运行状况监视事件的错误。The , the failure audit, and the error health-monitoring events are configured (enabled) by default. 这意味着，失败审核和默认运行状况监视事件会记录在 Windows 应用程序事件日志中的错误。This means that the failure audit and the error health-monitoring events are logged in the Windows Application Event Log by default. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将是一种能够使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，因为实现，并且将通过指定中的值控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 你还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关创建自定义提供程序的示例，请参阅[如何： 实现运行状况监视自定义提供程序示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c)。For an example of creating a custom provider, see [How to: Implement the Health Monitoring Custom Provider Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c). ## Examples 下面的配置文件摘录演示如何指定类型的提供程序来处理成功审核事件。The following configuration file excerpt shows how to specify a provider of type to handle success audit events. ，并且默认情况下配置要监视的失败审核运行状况事件类型。The and the failure audit health-event types to monitor are configured by default. 若要监视成功审核，您需要配置它们中的示例代码所示。To monitor the success audits, you need to configure them, as shown in the example code. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: 将事件从提供程序缓冲区移到事件日志中。

span.span: Moves events from the provider's buffer into the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用此方法时，所有提供程序的缓冲区中的事件会立即被写入到 Windows 应用程序事件日志，而无论多少时间已过自最后一次写入或多少事件是缓冲区中。When this method is called, all the events in the provider's buffer are immediately written to the Windows Application Event Log, regardless of how much time has elapsed since last write or how many events are in the buffer. 最后一次写入时将重置为刷新操作的时间。The time of the last write is reset to the time of the flushing action. 如果未启用缓冲机制，调用此方法没有任何效果。If the buffering mechanism is not enabled, calling this method does not have any effect.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Initialize (string name, System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(string name, class System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (name As String, config As NameValueCollection)
public: override void Initialize(System::String ^ name, System::Collections::Specialized::NameValueCollection ^ config);

param.name: name
param.span: 配置文件中用于标识此提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name used in the configuration file to identify this provider.

param.name: config
param.span: 一个 ，指定配置文件中为此提供程序分配的特性。

span.span: A that specifies the attributes assigned for this provider in the configuration file.
Sets the initial values for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以初始化的配置设置和配置文件中指定的名称。This method is called to initialize the with the configuration settings and name as specified in the configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ProcessEvent(class System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent eventRaised) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ProcessEvent (eventRaised As WebBaseEvent)

summary.span: 处理传递给提供程序的事件。

span.span: Processes the event passed to the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是，ASP.NET 运行状况监视功能可调用以启动事件的处理方法。This is the method that ASP.NET health monitoring calls to start the processing of the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed

summary.span: 执行与关闭提供程序相关联的任务。

span.span: Performs tasks associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 调用方法时托管 Web 应用程序的应用程序域终止。ASP.NET calls the method when the application domain hosting the Web application terminates. 该方法调用以执行将允许应用程序正常结束的任务。The method is called to perform tasks that will allow the application to end gracefully.
